description: Numerators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(506).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,90,0,-1).
formula: G.f.: (22 + 45*x + 22*x^2 - x^3)/(1 - 90*x^2 + x^4). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 12 2013a(n) = 90*a(n-2) - a(n-4). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 12 2013
mathematica: Numerator[Convergents[Sqrt[506], 30]] (* or *) CoefficientList[Series[(22 + 45 x + 22 x^2 - x^3)/(1 - 90 x^2 + x^4), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 12 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[22,45,2002,4049]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 90*Self(n-2)-Self(n-4): n in [1..25]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 12 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
